alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued April 12 at 5:48AM AKDT until April 12 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 40 below zero occuring. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills north of Unalakleet. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and coldest wind chills are north of Unalakleet. Conditions are much less severe from Unalakleet south. Wind chills will become less severe this afternoon as temperatures slowly rise.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
